about_the_game: Plungeroo is a colorful puzzle game about tinkering with mini pinball cabinets, no quick reflexes or quarters required! Maneuver your ball through Pop Bumpers, Flippers, and more until you become a pinball wizard!  In this demo get a feel for the puzzles and play through 25+ levels!
detailed_description: Plungeroo is a colorful puzzle game about tinkering with mini pinball cabinets, no quick reflexes or quarters required! Maneuver your ball through Pop Bumpers, Flippers, and more until you become a pinball wizard!  In this demo get a feel for the puzzles and play through 25+ levels!
name: Plungeroo Demo
short_description: Plungeroo is a colorful puzzle game about tinkering with mini pinball cabinets, no quick reflexes or quarters required! Maneuver your ball through Pop Bumpers, Flippers, and more until you become a pinball wizard! In this demo get a feel for the puzzles and play through 25+ levels!
